logo.description: A playful logo featuring a dog paw and a leash.

sections.title: Welcome to Pawsome Walks
sections.subtitle: Where Every Walk is a Wagging Success!
sections.name: hero-section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Join us at Pawsome Walks, where your dog's happiness is our priority! Experience personalized dog walking services tailored to your and your furry friend's needs. Sign up today and let your dog enjoy the outdoors, exercise, and playtime they deserve!

images.name: hero-image.jpg
images.description: A joyful dog walking in a park.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Passion, Your Pups
sections.name: about-section
sections.label: About
sections.content: At Pawsome Walks, we are dedicated dog lovers inspired by our own furry companions. Our mission is to provide reliable, trustworthy, and enjoyable walking experiences for dogs across the city. We connect dog owners with caring walkers who personalize each walk to ensure your pet's well-being and happiness.

images.name: about-bg.jpg
images.description: A group of dogs happily playing together.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailor-Fit Walks for Every Pooch
sections.name: services-section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Flexible Scheduling**: Choose the days and times that work best for you and your pet.
- **Size-Specific Walks**: Walkers set tailored prices and max dogs per walk based on your dog’s size.
- **Easy Booking**: Owners can request walks quickly and see a history of all walks.
- **Secure Payments**: Pay after each walk via our 3rd party billing system.
- **Ratings & Reviews**: Feedback from owners helps ensure quality walker experiences.

Check out [our services page](services.html) for more details!

images.name: services-image.jpg
images.description: A dog walker with several dogs on leashes, smiling in the park.

sections.title: Pricing Packages
sections.subtitle: Affordable Walks for Every Budget
sections.name: pricing-section
sections.label: Pricing
sections.content:
**Pricing Plans**

- **Small Dogs ($10 - $20/walk)**
- **Medium Dogs ($20 - $35/walk)**
- **Large Dogs ($35 - $50/walk)**

Customize the perfect walking plan for your dogs based on size and distance. Fairly priced, competitively structured.

images.name: pricing-img.png
images.description: Price range chart for small, medium, and large dogs.

sections.title: Meet Our Walkers
sections.subtitle: Caring Professionals
sections.name: team-section
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our walkers are not just animal lovers—they are trained, trustworthy, and thoroughly vetted individuals dedicated to ensuring a safe and enjoyable walk for your furry friends. Meet our team and read more about their experiences and love for dogs [here](team.html).

images.name: walker-headshot1.jpg
images.description: Photo of a smiling professional dog walker.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Let’s Get in Touch
sections.name: contact-section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Have questions or need assistance? Feel free to reach out to us through any of the following methods:

- **Email**: support@pawsomewalks.com
- **Phone**: 555-0123-4567
- **Address**: 123 Walker Lane, Dogtown

We're always here to help!

images.name: contact-icon.png
images.description: A phone and envelope icon symbolizing communication.

sections.title: Read Our Testimonials
sections.subtitle: Happy Tails, Happy Hearts
sections.name: testimonials-section
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
"Pawsome Walks transformed our mornings! Our pup is always excited and full of energy. The walkers are reliable and compassionate." — **Alex & Charley**

"Super easy to book and such friendly service. Our dog has never been happier!" — **Jamie & Luna**

images.name: testimonial-img.jpg
images.description: Smiling dog owner next to walker with dog.

sections.title: Stay Updated
sections.subtitle: Latest Walks and Tips
sections.name: news-section
sections.label: News
sections.content: Stay tuned for our latest news, dog walking tips, and adorable dog photos. Follow us on [social media](#)!

images.name: news-image.jpg
images.description: A social media collage featuring dogs.

sections.title: Join Our Pack
sections.subtitle: Get Started Today
sections.name: call-to-action-section
sections.label: Join
sections.content: Ready to take the next step for your dog's well-being? Register your dog or sign up as a walker now. Click [here](signup.html) to get started!

images.name: cta-image.jpg
images.description: Smiling dog ready to go on a walk with leash in its mouth
